channel.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
channel.description: I suggest a blood splatter or some bruise marks for Kliener in UC. You could use the same labcoat for the Blast Pit scientist, too.

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
zable:

wel i could have been wrong, i just remember something like that being said. but oh well. theres too much speculation going into this already, its a headcrab, valve probably didnt even intend for it to have a backstory, just there for comedic effect

He says that in the original scene, not in the retail one.

“I don’t know how you can stand to keep that thing around… after what it did to your partners…”

Read full topic

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.dc:creator: zable
item.description:
Lord Grievous:

He didn’t say “after what it did to your friends.” nor did he get the damn thing from Black Mesa. They were injured and trying to avoid getting killed, why would they try and take one of those headcrabs with them?

He probably got it from C17 when researching them, and after debeaking it he realized it wasn’t dangerous anymore and decided to keep it.

wel i could have been wrong, i just remember something like that being said. but oh well. theres too much speculation going into this already, its a headcrab, valve probably didnt even intend for it to have a backstory, just there for comedic effect

Read full topic

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
He didn’t say “after what it did to your friends.” nor did he get the damn thing from Black Mesa. They were injured and trying to avoid getting killed, why would they try and take one of those headcrabs with them?

He probably got it from C17 when researching them, and after debeaking it he realized it wasn’t dangerous anymore and decided to keep it.

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.dc:creator: zable
item.description:
MysticJ:

Zero. An injured scientist will not return back from where his injuries are treated to try to capture an aggresive looking creature.

Lammar is most probably a headcrab caught during Combine oppresion.

not true, im pretty sure its from black mesa, as i remember barney in HL2 said something along the lines of “you really want to keep that thing? after what it did to your friends/pals?” when complaining about lamarr near the beginning

Read full topic

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.dc:creator: Skaevola
item.description:
nighttarga:

that’d be stupid

You’re stupid! :’(

I always figured, what with Kleiner being an old man, that when Vance said, “I’m afraid to move him,” it was because every time Vance tried to talk to him about what happened, he had a panic attack. I mean, these scientists clearly don’t respond well to danger. points at scientist hiding in a dumpster
Basically he’s afraid to move him because he’s in a corner in the foetal position. Is my theory.

Read full topic

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...

item.description:
baconeggs:

How the hell do you go about showing that it’s a conspiracy theorist?

Would be nice if there was one of those “I want to believe” UFO posters in one of the offices

item.description:
After Gordon leaves, a portal opens to where City 17 will be.

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
I don’t see how they made it out alive full stop, considering Gordon had to climb through a vent, over some computer towers and down a drain in order to get out.

Read full topic

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.description:
Cobra:

I suggest a blood splatter or some bruise marks for Kliener in UC. You could use the same labcoat for the Blast Pit scientist, too.

Nedepp:

Good idea. It could make the whole situation more tense if he was laying on the ground with some blood around him. It would make the player feel how life threatening the incident was.

no offense, but these two arguments are retarded. kleiner’s alive in hl2 and in good shape. obviously he suffered only minor injury in hl. i don’t see how as frail as he is, he’s going to make it out alive after being bashed bloody.

Read full topic

darkone:

If any one knew about black mesa in half life you would have seen at least one dead conspiracy theorist dead one one of the top side levels.

How the hell do you go about showing that it’s a conspiracy theorist?

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.dc:creator: nighttarga
item.description:
Mr. Someguy:

It says “Suggestion Box Features, details and ideas you’d like to see in-game”.

Basically you just post ideas you think would be cool in the mod and the devs decide if they will used them or not.

^this^

Read full topic

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.dc:creator: Ajax
item.description:
Weren’t they?

Anyway, a few posts back, to Skilgannon, yes, that is supposed to be Kleiner. Marc Laidlaw himself said that it was an oversight as to which character model they used at that point in time, but that Kleiner is supposed to be the guy next to Eli in that area.

Read full topic

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.dc:creator: Xappy
item.description:
Yeah but what they did there was secret, so you still might get a conspiracy theorist saying that they were doing experiments on aliens in there or something.

Read full topic

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
darkone:

If any one knew about black mesa in half life you would have seen at least one dead conspiracy theorist dead one one of the top side levels. (they will try and get into any government area because they think it has something hidden)

Yeah you’re right. Black Mesa was totally secret. That’s why they stamp a their logo on every crate, boxcar, and shipping container in the complex, and openly advertise employment opportunities on the tramride in. Totally secret.

Read full topic

item.title: About Kleiner's Injury...
item.dc:creator: Xappy
item.description:
Well they rebuilt Hiroshima.
And when they rebuilt Hiroshima they had to contend with portal storms and alien invasion and the almost complete annihilation of the human race too.
